content: the free version of this pattern is available on my linked blog- https //www draiguna com/2022/01/arcanoweave-part-5 html if you have already purchased the pdf this update is available for free in your pattern library this is part 5 of the arcanoweave doily the pattern continues where part 4 left off starting on round 67 and ending with round 82 the finished size measures about 26 in diameter pattern is written using u s terminology the russian version for part 5 will be available soon here are links to the previous sections- part 1 arcane aura- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/arcane-aura part 2 incanter s insight- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/incanters-insight part 3 evocation- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/evocation part 4 innervision- https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/innervision materials needed- size 10 crochet thread- for part 5- 450-500 yards for the entire doily- 1300-1400 yards 1 75 mm hook yarn needle scissors special stitches- 2-fptr decrease 3-fptr popcorn 2-fpdc decrease 4-double_crochet popcorn 3-fpdc decrease picot large picot small picot 2-double_crochet cluster
